title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3060/91 of 18 October 1991 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3143/85 on the sale at reduced prices of intervention butter intended for direct consumption in the form of concentrated butter
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 3060/91  of 18 October 1991  amending Regulation (EEC) No 3143/85 on the sale at reduced prices of intervention butter intended for direct consumption in the form of concentrated butter
THE COMMISSION OF THE  EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 October 1991. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 148, 28. 6. 1968, p. 13. (2) OJ No L 150, 15. 6. 1991, p. 19. (3) OJ No L 298, 12. 11. 1985, p. 9. (4) OJ No L 261, 7. 9. 1989, p. 6.
